description: This file contains the styles for the interactive tic-tac-toe application, including theme variables, layout definitions, and styles for various components such as the game title, status display, game board, and restart button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout and color theme.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the game title display, emphasizing size and weight.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the current game status, with different styles for winning states.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout styles for the tic-tac-toe board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the tic-tac-toe board, including hover effects.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styles for the restart button with hover and active state effects.
